sentences.en: ' Ah! most gracious Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, where is that emigrant?
sentences.cn: 啊, 最仁慈的前侯爵先生, 那外满贵族在哪儿?

sentences.en: 'With your gracious permission, that was the wonder of it, Monseigneur.
sentences.cn: “ 请恕我直言, 怪就怪在这儿, 大人.

sentences.en: All this gracious living isn't for me; I prefer the simple life.
sentences.cn: 这优裕的生活不适合我, 我宁愿过简朴的生活.

sentences.en: He drove through the gracious suburbs with the swimming pools and tennis courts.
sentences.cn: 他驾车穿过设有游泳池和网球场的舒适城郊住宅区。

sentences.en: I received a gracious letter of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 我收到一封有礼貌的感谢信.

sentences.en: I wish to thank you for your very gracious and eloquent remarks.
sentences.cn: 我要感谢你的非常盛情和雄辨的讲话.

sentences.en: It was gracious of you to come.
She closed with a gracious speech of thanks.
sentences.cn: 她最后彬彬有礼地致谢，结束了讲话。

sentences.en: She conducted herself in a most gracious manner.

sentences.cn: 她是位和蔼可亲的女士.

sentences.en: She was , to the end, a gentlewoman of the old school , gracious and mannerly.
sentences.cn: 说到底, 她仍是一位温文尔雅 、 礼貌可嘉的守旧派的贵妇人.

sentences.en: She was a very gracious lady.
sentences.cn: 她是一位非常和蔼可亲的女士.

sentences.en: She was gracious enough to show us round her home.
sentences.cn: 她彬彬有礼地领我们参观了她的家.

sentences.en: Sibyl was the most gracious, helpful, and generous person to work with.
sentences.cn: 西比尔非常和蔼，乐于助人，而且为人慷慨，和她共事最愉快。

sentences.en: We shall be greatly honoured by your gracious presence.

trans.tran_cn: 亲切的，和蔼的，（对王族及其行为的敬语）仁慈的，谦和的，雅致的，有礼貌的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a polite, kind, and generous way, especially to people of a lower rank
